page.title: 07Tourism
page.content: In our area is a small family run hotel which has accommodation for 25 and can cater for 180 in its large function room.The hotel was originally a farm which was converted first into a guest house and later a hotel.During the summer,most of the visitors are tourists who visit the superb west wales beaches.Many of the visitors are foreign.During the winter most visitors are buisness people.The hotel has only one full time staff but employs six part time workers.The hotels busiest time is between October and April.The hotel is popular for parties and wedding receptions some of which are booked up to 2 years ahead. The most popular meal served at the hotel is a turkey dinner.The new by-pass has made no differance to the party trade but the bed and breakfast trade has been affected.
